social and financial costs which hinder the realisation of 
maximum benefits to the country. The foremost cost of 
labour migration is the social cost emanating from the

the  time,  the  health,  nutrition  and  security  of  children 
are compromised in the families of migrant employees, 
especially  with  maternal  migration.  Moreover,  lack  of 
financial  literacy  of  some  migrant  workers  as  well  as
